*An R package providing spatial transformation methods for movement data*

The primary aim of the _anispace_ package is to provide spatial transformation methods for movement data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of *anispace* with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages('anispace', repos = c('https://animovement.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```

Once you have installed the package, you can load it with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library("anispace")
```
